statements: SELECT * FROM participants
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 25
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, participant_gender FROM participants WHERE study_phase = 'Phase 2'
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE study_location LIKE 'New%'
SELECT participant_name, participant_gender FROM participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC, participant_gender
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM participants WHERE participant_gender='Female' ORDER BY participant_age DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE study_phase='Phase 3' AND study_location='New York'
SELECT participant_name, participant_age, participant_gender, study_phase, study_location FROM participants ORDER BY participant_name ASC, participant_age DESC
SELECT DISTINCT study_phase FROM participants
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM participants
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE age > 25
SELECT name, age FROM participants ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM studies WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE gender = 'male' ORDER BY name
SELECT study_name, study_owner FROM studies
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE age > 30
SELECT participant_id, name, gender FROM participants WHERE study_id = 1 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM studies WHERE study_owner = 'John Doe' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT p.name, p.age, s.study_name FROM participants p JOIN studies s ON p.study_id = s.study_id
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 25
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM participants WHERE participant_gender = 'Male';

SELECT participant_name, study_name FROM participants JOIN study_participant_mapping ON participants.participant_id = study_participant_mapping.participant_id JOIN studies ON study_participant_mapping.study_id = studies.study_id;
SELECT * FROM studies ORDER BY study_start_date DESC;

SELECT participant_name, study_name, enrollment_date FROM participants JOIN study_participant_mapping ON participants.participant_id = study_participant_mapping.participant_id JOIN studies ON study_participant_mapping.study_id = studies.study_id WHERE participants.participant_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM participants WHERE participant_gender = 'Male';
SELECT participant_name, participant_status FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 30 ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM studies WHERE study_end_date > '2022-01-01' AND study_start_date < '2021-06-01';

SELECT study_name, study_description, participant_name FROM studies JOIN study_participant_mapping ON studies.study_id = study_participant_mapping.study_id JOIN participants ON study_participant_mapping.participant_id = participants.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_id, name, age, gender, contact_information FROM participants ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_studies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT record_date, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT study_id, participant_id FROM study_participants WHERE study_id = '12345-67890';
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM participants WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT participants.name, medical_records.diagnosis FROM participants JOIN medical_records ON participants.participant_id = medical_records.participant_id;
SELECT research_studies.study_name, study_participants.participant_id FROM research_studies JOIN study_participants ON research_studies.study_id = study_participants.study_id;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 30;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM participants ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT study_name, study_start_date, study_end_date FROM studies WHERE study_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM study_sites WHERE site_location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 30;
SELECT study_name, study_start_date, study_end_date FROM studies ORDER BY study_start_date DESC;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM study_sites WHERE study_id = 1 LIMIT 5;
SELECT network_name, network_type FROM blockchain_network WHERE security_level = 'high';
